feed.title: Clipious Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Clipious: 1.20.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/575
  • local subscriptions by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/581

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/compare/1.19.12...1.20.0

entry.title: New release for Clipious: 1.21.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/582
  • Android: support users certificates and fix video play with selfsigned proxy by @yurark in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/583
  • add custom header for mobile app by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/589
  • add more video download options by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/590
  • Feature/flutter 3 24 by @lamarios in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/592
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/591

New Contributors

  • @yurark made their first contribution in https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/pull/583

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lamarios/clipious/compare/1.20.0...1.21.0

entry.title: New release for Clipious: 1.21.1
